findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The contract owner can mint an unlimited number of tokens after initial contract creation/deployment.

findings.title: Unprotected Constructor
findings.description: The constructor is public and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Insecure Transfer Functions
findings.description: Multiple private transfer functions (_transferFromExcluded, _transferBothExcluded, _transferBurn) are present, which can lead to unauthorized asset transfers.

findings.title: approve
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in approve function.

findings.title: _transferFromExcluded
findings.description: Private function _transferFromExcluded has been identified.

findings.title: increaseAllowance
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Decrease Allowance
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: deliver
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: includeInFee
findings.description: The includeInFee function does not properly handle fee calculations, potentially leading to incorrect fee distributions.

findings.title: excludeFromFee
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: includeInReward
findings.description: The includeInReward function has restricted access and can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: includeInAllowList
findings.description: The includeInAllowList function has an access control issue, allowing only the owner to call it.

findings.title: excludeFromAllowList
findings.description: The excludeFromAllowList function has a potential vulnerability as it can only be accessed by the owner.

findings.title: includeInBlockList
findings.description: The includeInBlockList function has a critical vulnerability as it can only be accessed by the owner.

findings.title: excludeFromBlockList
findings.description: The excludeFromBlockList function has restricted access and can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: setTaxFeePercent
findings.description: The setTaxFeePercent function allows the owner to set a tax fee percentage.

findings.title: permit
findings.description: The permit function has been marked as vulnerable.

findings.title: Mint Function
findings.description: The mint function has been flagged as a potential security risk.

findings.title: _transferBurn
findings.description: Private function _transferBurn found in smart contract.

findings.title: Unprotected Swap Functions
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions are present in the contract, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in skim function.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The smart contract contains unprotected sync functions which can lead to reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.
